head.title: A July Wedding For Miss Rainis

hedline.hl1: A July Wedding For Miss Rainis

block.p: Mr. and Mrs. Eugene C. Rainis of Mendham, N.J., have announced July wedding plans for their daughter Ellen Gerardine Rainis and the Rev. Michael Jay Peters, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Charles R. Peters of Reading, Pa.

Miss Rainis, 26 years old, graduated from Bryn Mawr College and is studying for an M.A. in history at East Stroudsburg University. Her father is a partner in Brown Brothers Harriman & Company, a private bank in New York.

Mr. and Mrs. Eugene C. Rainis of Mendham, N.J., have announced July wedding plans for their daughter Ellen Gerardine Rainis and the Rev. Michael Jay Peters, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Charles R. Peters of Reading, Pa.

Miss Rainis, 26 years old, graduated from Bryn Mawr College and is studying for an M.A. in history at East Stroudsburg University. Her father is a partner in Brown Brothers Harriman & Company, a private bank in New York.

Pastor Peters, 41, is the associate pastor of Trinity Lutheran Church in Robesonia, Pa. He graduated from the University of Maryland and received a master of divinity degree from the Lutheran Theological Seminary in Gettysburg, Pa. His mother, Kay Peters, is a nurse at St. Luke's Hospital in Easton, Pa. His father, who is retired, was a manager for the Bethlehem Steel Company in Bethlehem, Pa.
